infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Your current location will be displayed on the map and used for directions, nearby search result and estimated distance.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Your current location will be displayed on the map and used for directions, nearby search result and estimated distance
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take picture for posting
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses Photo Library to pick up image for posting
